dcterms:creator: Federica Bogo
Javier Romero
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J Black
dcterms:description: The Dynamic FAUST Dataset consists of 129 scanned 4D sequences of human motions with soft tissue movement captured at 60 fps. Each frame contains a tissue surface mesh of 6,890 vertices and a skeletal pose with body shape parameters which can be converted into an SMPL mesh model.
dcterms:title: Dynamic FAUST Dataset
